name: Oneiros - Demo
description:
This is a demo version (current version: 1.0.6).

The full game is expected for 2017 and is subject to changes.

Game is in French or English, depending on the version you download (FR or EN)

Dive into a strange universe in which everybody's emotion is fading away. Assist a mysterious child in her quest for restoring this dull land to its original lively state. You can do it. Because you are the essence of emotions.

Oneiros is an atypical puzzle game with an emotional storyline in which you interact with various characters by affecting their emotions.

***

How to play ?

Oneiros can be played with keyboard and mouse or with gamepad.

Controls are explained in-game.

***

The team

Fireplace is made of 4 French students, who just finished their 3rd year at Supinfogame Rubika.

  • Isabelle "Oriolie" Lallemand - Game Designer, Scenarist, Sound Designer
  • Anaïs Jancenelle - Game Artist
  • Adrien Poncet - Programmer (itch.io page)
  • Romain "ChronoDream" Trésarrieu - Producer, Game Designer, Scenarist

***

Help us improve the full game!

[French speakers only] Si vous avez testé la démo du jeu et que vous souhaitez nous aider à l'améliorer, vous pouvez nous faire un retour d'expérience via ce questionnaire. Toute aide nous sera très utile !
